agreeToTerms: I agree to the Terms and Conditions
termsAndConditionsText: Here are the terms and conditions...
userObligations: By using this platform, you agree to provide accurate and truthful information during registration and while using the services. Any misrepresentation may lead to account suspension or termination.
dataPrivacy: Your personal information, including name, contact details, and uploaded documents, will be handled in accordance with our privacy policy. We are committed to protecting your data and will not share it without your consent unless required by law. All uploaded photos will be deleted after the review and verification process is completed.
prohibitedActivities: Users must not engage in unlawful or fraudulent activities, including the use of fake documents or information.
limitationOfLiability: This platform and its providers will not be held responsible for any losses or damages arising from the use or inability to use the services provided.
changesToTerms: We reserve the right to update these terms and conditions at any time. Continued use of the platform after changes have been made indicates acceptance of the updated terms.
maxPassReached: You have reached the maximum number of passes.
sameFileError: You cannot upload the same file for both documents
contractHint: Document proving your relationship to the unit (lease/ownership/power of attorney)
uploadInstructions:
Please upload one of the following documents according to your status:
- If you are a tenant: Official rental contract clearly showing (unit details, contract end date, and signatures of both parties)
- If you are an owner: Official handover document or ownership contract
- If you are a representative: Certified power of attorney with the owner's ID document

Important notes:
1. The name in the attached document must match the name registered in the application
2. Documents must be clear and complete
3. Applications with unclear or incomplete documents will not be accepted
